title: Autumn
description: You are in fall! Bears foraging in your territory bedamned, you fear nothing. And with the dry air and all this fallen foliage, perfect kindling for to burn your adversaries!

title: Winter
description: You are in winter! You love cold feet, sticking your tongue on your steel blade just for the fun of it and look great sporting the silver fox look as your beard freezes.

title: Winter
description: It’s winter, time for hot toddies and canoodling by the fire with your favorite book… oh wait clearly wrong game....

title: Winter
description: It’s winter in the forest! Run through the snowy fields and ford the frozen river as you attempt to rule the creatures of the wood!

title: Lake
description: You are at the lake! Ah! Fresh air! A little boating and some fishing. Just the thing to keep your mind off those whispering bubbles—your adversaries last gasps of air as they sink to the bottom with your prize rock collection.

title: Mountain
description: You are on the mountain! Surely one cannot rule the land until they are king of the mountain. Reach the summit, show your prowess, let the plebs gasp at your mighty tree fort.

title: Ranger
description: You are ranger! Never mind the epithets of “murderwolf”. Go forth wanderlust rogue and trap some juicy hares!

title: Thief
description: You are thief! Go forth mysterious rogue! Pilfer what is rightfully yours and reap the rewards of magnanimity when you give it back to them.

title: Tinker
description: You are tinker! Fair travels thwack tailed rogue! Never mind the groans from the crowd. We all know you have favor in the forest!

title: Vagrant
description: You are vagrant! Go forth and spread the “good” word! Don’t worry, they will believe you, they have no choice!

title: Arbiter
description: You are arbiter! Dig holes, scowl, silently pass judgment and cleave insolence.

title: Scoundrel
description: You are scoundrel! Fare thee well masked avenger! Although no one, not even yourself quite knows what it is you hope to avenge.

title: Adventurer
description: You are adventurer! Your parents never understood your fascination with breaking your toys. Luckily sly uncle MacGyver got it and reared you into the resourceful raptor you are now. Go forth and plunge square pegs in round holes!

title: Ronin
description: You are ronin! Your honor—since they board wiped your last retainer—in tatters. Masterless , coalitionless, you seek only infamy now and somehow feel compelled to grumble everything in gruff, angry tones...like cursing with a mouth full of cookies.

title: Harrier
description: You are harrier! Something happened that late night in the oak tree when ol’ Grandpa Bushy reduced the acorns in root tea a little too richly. Watching him vanish into thin air, you decided to sip the family elixir. And just like that, your wanderlust life of adventure unfurled before your glazed eyes!
